name: SlideOnline
author: Julian Magnone

sections.description:
This is a very simple plugin created to embed PowerPoint presentations using SlideOnline.com in any blog powered by WordPress.

You can easily embed your PDF and PowerPoint presentations in a WordPress blog using SlideOnline.com that is a free service to share PowerPoint presentations online and an alternative to other PPT and presentation sharing platforms.

You can see a real example here: http://www.free-power-point-templates.com/articles/create-presentations-that-marvel-and-excite-with-eugene-cheng/
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

  1. Upload slideonline folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use [slideonline id=””] shortcode in your blog posts to embed a presentation

You can create a free account at SlideOnline.com and upload your PowerPoint presentations or PDF presentations.

short_description: Easily embed your presentations in a WordPress blog. SlideOnline.com is a free service to share PowerPoint presentations online.
